text: Ilie Gavril Bolojan (; born 17 March 1969) is a Romanian politician. He has been the President of the Senate of Romania since 2024. He was the mayor of Oradea, and the president of the Bihor County Council. In 2025, he became Acting President of Romania, following the resignation of Klaus Iohannis. ==Notes== ==References== Category:Living people Category:1969 births Category:Presidents of the Senate of Romania Category:Presidents of Romania
title: Ilie Bolojan
